Special Characters and Unicode Test File

ASCII Special Characters:
!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?`~

Unicode Characters:
- Greek: Î± Î² Î³ Î´ Îµ Î¶ Î· Î¸
- Math: âˆ€ âˆƒ âˆˆ âˆ‰ âˆ‘ âˆ âˆš âˆ
- Emoji: ğŸ”¥ âœ… âŒ ğŸ¯ ğŸ“
- Accented: cafÃ© rÃ©sumÃ© naÃ¯ve
- CJK: ä½ å¥½ä¸–ç•Œ ã“ã‚“ã«ã¡ã¯ ì•ˆë…•í•˜ì„¸ìš”
- Arabic: Ù…Ø±Ø­Ø¨Ø§ Ø¨Ùƒ
- Symbols: Â© Â® â„¢ â‚¬ Â£ Â¥

Whitespace variations:
	Tab character
  Multiple  spaces
Line with trailing spaces
